text: Dippin' Dots is an ice cream snack. It was invented by Curt Jones in 1988. It is created by flash freezing ice cream mix in liquid nitrogen. It is made by Dippin' Dots, Inc., headquartered in Paducah, Kentucky. ==Other websites== * Category:1988 establishments in the United States Category:American food companies Category:Companies based in Kentucky
title: Dippin' Dots
